mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REGISTER (USER_ID, NAME, ID, PASSWORD, BIRTHDAY, CELL_NUMBER, EMAIL, ADDR_CITY, ADDR_DISTRICT, TS_CS_ID, AUTH) VALUE (#{USER_ID}, #{NAME}, #{ID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{BIRTHDAY}, #{CELL_NUMBER}, #{EMAIL}, #{ADDR_CITY}, #{ADDR_DISTRICT} , #{TS_CS_ID}, #{AUTH})
INSERT INTO REGISTER_AGREE (TS_CS_ID, TS_CS, PER_INF_REQ, PER_INF_OPT, REGULATION, REC_MKT_INF) VALUES (#{TS_CS_ID}, #{TS_CS}, #{PER_INF_REQ}, #{PER_INF_OPT}, #{REGULATION}, #{REC_MKT_INF})
